title: OSE-25-Escort Fulfilment Request Schema
description: ESP confirms the date that the Escorts can be made available

quoteRef.description: BRM Unique Id being fulfilled. This was supplied by BRM for the initial request (the OSE booking request id)

receiptId.description: ESP unique Id being fulfilled. This was the UUID acknowledgement by the ESP for the initial request

preferredDepartureDate.description: Preferred date for the CWT to book the flights. Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

alternativeDate1.description: Preferred date for OSE to be made. Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

alternativeDate2.description: Preferred date for OSE to be made. Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD

additionalInformation.description: Comments related to Escorts or any information to assist CWT book the flights
